Articles.Content: I was testing an ssto and my game glitched and I had to restart the game. Now my favourite tester Jorlan is missing in action. how can I get him back? I read somewhere that you can edit some file. Any help would be appreciated, as when/if Jorlan dies, it will be in an epic crash, not a space/time ****.

i believe you can edit your persistent file to change the names and stats of your Kerbals. i'm pretty sure they respawn right now though. if you go back to your astronaut complex you might be able to recruit him again.

Only Jeb, Bob and Bill have the respawning tag, I think.

Sorry about the necroposting.

It seems all Kerbals respawn as of 0.23.5. Not just the famous trio. Any way to disable that? Or is the Kerbal name generator practically finite?

edit persistence.sfs, permadeath = true.

Where exactly? I'm gonna need some context, since the file is pretty big.

EDIT: Oh, wait. Found this:

DIFFICULTY
		{
			MissingCrewsRespawn = True
			AllowStockVessels = False
		}
